OK *warning* I'm a newb...I downloaded and that went great, I got the eval copy, I went to the help pull down window to unlock, I copy'd and pasted the info in the crack but...something didn't work. what now? what did I do wrong?

I'd recommend not downloading this one. Apparently this serial causes the program to act all wonky, so it will crash randomly and output CDGs that don't work. I even tried installing it on a fresh window install without internet enabled (in hopes maybe it was phoning home and checking) but it still showed the same glitches.

I agree with DDLord, the program tend to always crash after about 4-5 minutes, so you have to be quick if you want to render some .cdg files. 

The output of the .cdg files is not great either, the lyrics get all messed upp with red and yellow colors making them hard to read, but other than that, it works.

But seriously folks, is this the best .cdg making program available on TPB?
If you got something better, please post.
